## Get the JSON data

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
json_file = "D:/Study/UoA-STATS-769/Labs/Lab04/JSON/trips-1.json"
json <- fromJSON(readLines(json_file))
json
```

## Get the MongoDB data

```{r}
library(mongolite)
mongo_db <- mongo("trips")
mongo_db
mongo_db$find(limit=3)
mongo_db$find(query='{"vehicle_type": "scooter"}')
```
